page.title: 10Blackridge Gala-Day
page.content: Many towns in West Lothian have {Gala-days. }Blackridge Gala-Day is always held on the last Saturday in June. On the morning of the Gala-Day most of the children from the school go up and stand behind the places that are marked for their classes. After that they walk up round the school behind the{bands. }Then they walk up round the flats at Woodhill. Then they walk down the{Main Street. Next they walk round Westrigg and then they walk to the park. Then the events start. There are races for all ages. There is the running race, sack race three legged race,skipping race, egg and spoon race. Then they go to the {funfair.} The funfair is held in a {farmer's field.}The first Gala-Day was held up the Westcraigs Hill with one piper.
